attributes.action: Introduce the Single Transferable Vote (STV) form of Proportional Representation for local elections in England.
attributes.additional_details:
Introduce Single Transferable Vote (STV) form of Proportional Representation for local elections in England, as has been working in Scotland since 2007, contributing to 10% higher turnout than in England, more parties represented, fewer wasted votes.
It will revitalise English democracy from the bottom up, making it far more representative and accessible.
